text:
He walked slowly, watching her. 

“Home? Where?” he thought. 

Sonia turned the corner. He crossed over and followed. 

He was tall, thick-set, dressed well. A gentleman. 

His cane tapped the pavement. His gloves gleamed. 

Sonia seemed lost in thought. 

They reached the canal bank. 

Only they remained on the pavement. 

She entered her lodging. He followed her inside.

**PAGE SUMMARY:** A mysterious man observes Sonia as she walks home, intrigued by her demeanor and intent on discovering more about her.
